metadata.title: CVE-2024-26952 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:fix potencial out-of-bounds when buffer offset is invalid I found potencialout-of-bounds when buffer offset fields of a few requests is invalid. Thispatch set the minimum value of buffer offset field to ->Buffer offset tovalidate buffer length.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
